summary: At the house of a famous Chinese botanist teacher his daughter and a female intern fall in love with each other - a forbidden love that must be kept secret.
cast: Mylène Jampanoï|Xiaoran Li|Dong Fu Lin|Wei-chang Wang|Nhu Quynh Nguyen|Nguyen Van Quang|Linh Thj Bich Thu|Thi Xuan Thuc Nguyen|Phuong-Thanh|Tuo Jilin|Dinh Xuang Tung|Le Ba Anh|Vuong Trach Vu|Drieu Van Chau|Chu Hung|Lê Tung Linh|Jun Yang
title: Les filles du botaniste
